on reading compounds: 伝【デン】legend, tradition, biography, life, method, way, horseback transportation and communication relay system used in ancient Japan
駅伝【エキデン】long-distance relay race, stagecoach, post horse
評伝【ヒョウデン】a critical biography
転手【テンジュ】tuning peg (of a shamisen, etc.)
伝達コスト【テンタツコスト】transmission cost
kun reading compounds: 伝わる【つたわる】to be handed down, to be introduced, to be transmitted, to be circulated, to go along, to walk along
伝える【つたえる】to convey, to report, to transmit, to communicate, to tell, to impart, to propagate, to teach, to bequeath
伝う【つたう】to go along, to walk along, to follow
伝【つて】means of making contact, intermediary, go-between, connections, influence, pull, good offices
伝言【つてこと】verbal message, word (from someone), rumour, rumor
風のつて【かぜのつて】hearsay, rumor, grapevine
